name: Perihelius Mission
description:
Explore an asteroid belt while maintaining a stable orbit in this physics-based prototype!

---

Orbital space station Aphelius has been hastily dispatched in response to peculiar radio activity detected near the surface of numerous distant stars, as well as our own. 

Equipped with a Perihelius™ Control Terminal and an array of landers, the Aphelius crew are prepared to navigate and explore the area.

Having achieved a relatively stable orbit around our star, the mission can begin.

---

Be sure to review the Controls and Help tabs in the Pause menu!
